Please fill out the prediction form with the following information:

• High Blood Pressure: 0 = No, 1 = Yes
• High Cholesterol: 0 = No, 1 = Yes
• Cholesterol Check (last 5 years): 0 = No, 1 = Yes
• BMI (Body Mass Index): Numeric (e.g., 24.5)
• Smoker (100+ cigarettes in life): 0 = No, 1 = Yes
• Stroke: 0 = No, 1 = Yes
• Heart Disease or Heart Attack: 0 = No, 1 = Yes
• Physical Activity (past 30 days): 0 = No, 1 = Yes
• Fruit Consumption (1+ per day): 0 = No, 1 = Yes
• Vegetable Consumption (1+ per day): 0 = No, 1 = Yes
• Heavy Alcohol Consumption: 0 = No, 1 = Yes
• Any Healthcare Coverage: 0 = No, 1 = Yes
• Couldn’t See Doctor Due to Cost: 0 = No, 1 = Yes

• General Health (GenHlth):
 1 = Excellent
 2 = Very Good
 3 = Good
 4 = Fair
 5 = Poor

• Mental Health Days (MentHlth): 0–30
• Physical Health Days (PhysHlth): 0–30
• Difficulty Walking or Climbing Stairs (DiffWalk): 0 = No, 1 = Yes
• Sex: 0 = Female, 1 = Male

• Age Group (Age):
 1 = 18–24
 2 = 25–29
 3 = 30–34
 4 = 35–39
 5 = 40–44
 6 = 45–49
 7 = 50–54
 8 = 55–59
 9 = 60–64
 10 = 65–69
 11 = 70–74
 12 = 75–79
 13 = 80 or older

• Education Level:
 1 = Never attended school / Kindergarten only
 2 = Elementary (Grades 1–8)
 3 = Some high school (Grades 9–11)
 4 = High school graduate / GED
 5 = Some college / technical school
 6 = College 4+ years

Outcome:
• Diabetes Status:
 0 = No Diabetes
 1 = Prediabetes or Diabetes
